beamWeapons.name: Laser
beamWeapons.description: The simplest beam weapon, the laser is used generally for small craft or point-defense batteries. It directs a focused beam of white-hot light to the target.

beamWeapons.name: IR Laser
beamWeapons.description: Somewhat more powerful than the visible laser, the IR (infrared) laser focuses light in the infrared spectrum.

beamWeapons.name: X-Ray Laser
beamWeapons.description: This device lases very high-energy x-rays. It is the most powerful of the light lasers.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Laser
beamWeapons.description: A more powerful version of the basic laser, the heavy laser delivers more energy to the target.

beamWeapons.name: Neutron Gun
beamWeapons.description: This device projects a stream of neutrons at the target, creating severe radiation effects and wreaking havoc with electronics and personnel.

beamWeapons.name: Fusion Laser
beamWeapons.description: Using a controlled fusion reaction to prime an immensely  powerful high-energy burst of radiation, the fusion laser is an extremely powerful version of the x-ray laser.

beamWeapons.name: Graser
beamWeapons.description: Like the x-ray laser, the graser is a device that lases very high-energy electromagnetic waves—in this case, gamma rays. It causes severe radiation damage to its target.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Neutron Gun
beamWeapons.description: A more powerful version of the neutron gun, capable of inflicting massive damage.

beamWeapons.name: Hydrogen Bore
beamWeapons.description: This mammoth weapon is basically a fusion torch drive designed to function as a weapon. It uses magnetic fields to direct a blast of fusing hydrogen at its target. The temperature of the hydrogen bore’s discharge approaches ten thousand degrees.

beamWeapons.name: Plasma Cannon
beamWeapons.description: The plasma cannon uses a powerful charge to convert a mix of chemicals into a white-hot plasma and then accelerates the mass toward the target with a simple rail gun. The result is a bolt of incandescent plasma that can explosively vaporize mundane materials.

beamWeapons.name: Particle Beam
beamWeapons.description: An improved version of the PL 6 neutron gun, this device projects a stream of protons, neutrons, or alpha particles at the target, accelerating each to near light-speed.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Particle Beam
beamWeapons.description: The heavy particle beam delivers a higher volume of particles to the target.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Plasma Cannon
beamWeapons.description: The heavy plasma cannon simply fires a larger bolt than the regular plasma cannon.

beamWeapons.name: Matter Beam
beamWeapons.description: The matter beam works much like a particle accelerator, except that it fires particles of antimatter. Cannot be fired through an atmosphere.

beamWeapons.name: Fusion Beam
beamWeapons.description: Like the hydrogen bore of Progress Level 6, the fusion beam initiates a fusion reaction and then directs the blast at the target. The PL 7 version is simply smaller and more efficient.

beamWeapons.name: Quantum Cannon
beamWeapons.description: The quantum cannon fires a stream of highly charged subatomic particles designed to destabilize the atoms of the target and create localized fission reactions.

beamWeapons.name: Boson Gun
beamWeapons.description: A larger and more powerful version of the quantum cannon.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Matter Beam
beamWeapons.description: A larger and more powerful version of the matter beam. Cannot be fired through an atmosphere.

beamWeapons.name: Fusion Bore
beamWeapons.description: The colossal fusion bore is simply an exceedingly large example of a fusion beam.

beamWeapons.name: Mass Cannon
beamWeapons.description: The mass cannon uses gravity manipulation to project devastating bolts of compressed matter.

beamWeapons.name: Quantum Cannon
beamWeapons.description: The quantum cannon uses quantum effects to bypass conventional defenses.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Quantum Cannon
beamWeapons.description: A devastatingly powerful quantum weapon capable of crippling capital ships.

beamWeapons.name: Conversion Beam
beamWeapons.description: The conversion beam converts matter directly to energy at the point of impact.

beamWeapons.name: Annihilator
beamWeapons.description: The annihilator is a massive antimatter weapon capable of destroying entire sections of a ship.

beamWeapons.name: Mass Driver
beamWeapons.description: The mass driver uses gravity manipulation to accelerate massive projectiles to devastating velocities.

beamWeapons.name: Maser
beamWeapons.description: The maser (microwave amplification by stimulated emission of radiation) fires concentrated microwave energy.

beamWeapons.name: Heavy Maser
beamWeapons.description: A more powerful maser with extended range and increased damage output.
